casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Richard Pabon, Appellant. [689 NYS2d 905]

—Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s motion to be relieved of assignment granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from Judgment of Erie County Court, Drury, J. — Attempted Criminal Promoting Prison Contraband, 1st Degree.) Present — Den-man, P. J., Pine, Wisner, Hurlbutt and Callahan, JJ.
